name: Mountaintop Cabin Weekend
description: Two nights at a quiet cabin with a private hot tub, chef-prepared meals, and a photo session to capture the memories.

name: Custom Family Story Necklace
description: Hand-stamped necklace featuring milestone charms chosen by the kids. Comes with a note from each child tucked in the box.

name: At-Home Spa & Story Night
description: A basket of spa treats, a handwritten playlist, and the kids reading their favorite bedtime story while candles glow.

name: Rocket Lab Afternoon
description: Build-your-own rocket launcher kit followed by a backyard launch party complete with mission badges and cocoa.

name: Adventure Scrapbook Starter
description: A bundle of instant film, blank comic panels, and colorful washi tapes so the kids can document every adventure.

name: Twilight Backyard Movie Night
description: Projector rental, homemade popcorn bar, glow sticks, and a vote on the feature film so every kid feels like the director.
